Christmas gift argument turns deadly as 14-year-old kills his older sister in Florida https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/christmas-gift-argument-turns-deadly-as-14-year-old-kills-his-older-sister-in-florida/6ZA2PG7JIFG6VNP6LX6YXTROBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/christmas-gift-argument-turns-deadly-as-14-year-old-kills-his-older-sister-in-florida/6ZA2PG7JIFG6VNP6LX6YXTROBM/ The sister was trying to diffuse an argument between brothers who were both armed. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 23:02:09 +0000 This photo provided by the Pinellas County Sheriff’s Office shows the house in Largo, Fla., where a woman holding her 11-month-old son in a baby carrier was fatally shot by her 14-year-old brother while trying to diffuse an argument over Christmas gifts. Photo / AP
